text: Bongkosh Ngamsom Rittichainuwat is an Thai Researcher, Scholar, Professor and academic administrator. She is currently Associate Dean & Professor of the international College of Hospitality & Tourism Management at Siam University. She is also the board member of Pacific Asia Travel Association. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bongkosh Rittichainuwat Category:Living people Category:Thai academics
title: Bongkosh Rittichainuwat
